SEARCH
Package bn.inference

Class PriorSampler

java.lang.Object
bn.inference.PriorSampler
Direct Known Subclasses:
WeightedSampler
public class PriorSampler extends Object
Class implementing the Prior-Sample algorithm from AIMA Section 14.5.1.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected BayesianNetwork
    network
    The BayesianNetwork being sampled by this PriorSampler.
    protected Random
    random
    The random number generator used by this PriorSampler.
    protected List<RandomVariable>
    variables
    The topologically-sorted list of RandomVariables from the BayesianNetwork being sampled by this PriorSampler.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PriorSampler(BayesianNetwork network)
    Construct and return a new PriorSampler for the given BayesianNetwork.
    PriorSampler(BayesianNetwork network, long seed)
    Construct and return a new PriorSampler for the given BayesianNetwork using the given seed for the Random number generator.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Assignment
    getSample()
    Returns an ArrayMapAssignment (event) sampled from the prior specified by the given BayesianNetwork.
    static void
    main(String[] argv)
    Reads a BayesianNetwork from a file and generates N samples from its prior distribution.
    protected Value
    randomSampleForVariable(RandomVariable Xi, Assignment x)
    Return a random sample from P(Xi|Parents(Xi)), where the value is sampled according to the conditional distribution given the values already sampled for the variable's parents (in the given ArrayMapAssignment).

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • network

      protected BayesianNetwork network
      The BayesianNetwork being sampled by this PriorSampler.

    • variables

      protected List<RandomVariable> variables
      The topologically-sorted list of RandomVariables from the BayesianNetwork being sampled by this PriorSampler.

    • random

      protected Random random
      The random number generator used by this PriorSampler.

  • Constructor Details

    • PriorSampler

      public PriorSampler(BayesianNetwork network)
      Construct and return a new PriorSampler for the given BayesianNetwork. Note that changes to the variables in the network will not be seen by the sampler (so don't do that).

    • PriorSampler

      public PriorSampler(BayesianNetwork network, long seed)
      Construct and return a new PriorSampler for the given BayesianNetwork using the given seed for the Random number generator.

  • Method Details

    • getSample

      public Assignment getSample()
      Returns an ArrayMapAssignment (event) sampled from the prior specified by the given BayesianNetwork.

      Note that the pseudo-code in Figure 14.13 does not mention that the variables must be sorted in topological order (although it is mentioned in the text and was mentioned in class). We looked after that in our constructor, since it's relatively expensive to compute and you want to generate samples quickly.

    • randomSampleForVariable

      protected Value randomSampleForVariable(RandomVariable Xi, Assignment x)
      Return a random sample from P(Xi|Parents(Xi)), where the value is sampled according to the conditional distribution given the values already sampled for the variable's parents (in the given ArrayMapAssignment).

    • main

      public static void main(String[] argv) throws ParserConfigurationException, SAXException, IOException
      Reads a BayesianNetwork from a file and generates N samples from its prior distribution.

      Usage: java bn.inference.PriorSampler N FILE

      With no arguments: 100 samples from aima-wet-grass.xml in the src tree.

      Throws:
      ParserConfigurationException
      SAXException
      IOException
